arts.ttl: Crystal Palace 3-0 Aston Villa: 4 talking points as Eagles hunt first major trophy & Villa drought continues
arts.sum: Crystal Palace swept Aston Villa aside to win Saturday evening’s FA Cup semi-final and book their place in next month’s final, as they hunt a first ever major trophy. Ismaila Sarr went on to get a second quickly after the penalty miss, before grabbing his second and Palace’s third in stoppage time.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace reaches FA Cup final for the third time after dismantling Aston Villa
arts.sum: Crystal Palace is getting another shot at winning the FA Cup — and won’t have to meet Manchester United in the final this time. Sa scored in the 58th and again in the fourth minute of stoppage time to seal a convincing win over an opponent that reached the Champions League quarterfinals this season.

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace 3-0 Aston Villa: Player ratings as Eagles book FA Cup final place
arts.sum: Jean-Philippe Mateta missed a penalty early in the second period, but instead of allowing Villa back into the game, Palace only piled on the pressure. SUB: Will Hughes (88' for Eze)

arts.ttl: How Crystal Palace made the most of their 'moments' against Aston Villa
arts.sum: BBC Sport's Micah Richards says Aston Villa dropped too deep against Crystal Palace's front three, allowing them to make the most of the "moments" that came their way in the FA Cup semi-final.

arts.ttl: Highlights: Palace beat Villa to reach FA Cup final
arts.sum: Crystal Palace reach the FA Cup final in spectacular style as Eberechi Eze and Ismaila Sarr drive them to a fully deserved victory against Aston Villa at Wembley.

arts.ttl: Ismaila Sarr scores second-half brace as Crystal Palace book FA Cup final spot
arts.sum: Eberechi Eze opened the scoring in the 31st minute before Ismaila Sarr’s second-half double.

arts.ttl: 'A nightmare to play against': Alan Shearer wowed by £9m Crystal Palace player in today's FA Cup semi-final win over Aston Villa
arts.sum: Crystal Palace are through to the FA Cup final after beating Aston Villa 3-0 in Saturday’s semi-final at Wembley. The Eagles overwhelmed the Villans at...

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace in dreamland as Eagles soar into FA Cup final at Aston Villa's expense
arts.sum: CRYSTAL PALACE 3-0 ASTON VILLA: A stunning strike from Eberechi Eze and a brace from Ismaila Sarr secured Palace a spot in the FA Cup final as Unai Emery's side were well beaten at Wembley

arts.ttl: Crystal Palace 3-0 Aston Villa: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Eze, Sarr fire Eagles to FA Cup final
arts.sum: Eberechi Eze and Ismaila Sarr conjure up semi-final scorchers as Crystal Palace reached the FA Cup final with a richly-deserved 3-0 win over Aston Villa to Wembley.

arts.ttl: LIVE: Aston Villa face Crystal Palace for place in FA Cup final
arts.sum: ESPN has all the updates from Wembley Stadium
